name: 虛擬實境媒體原理與應用
goals: Learn the relevant principles of virtual reality media and its applications in different scenarios

earn to apply virtual reality media to the practical applications of educational technology, medicine, medical rehabilitation, marketing and advertising, game industry, and film and television creation
syllabus:
Week 1: Introduction to virtual reality and the course

Week 2: VR related hardware/software introduction

Week 3: Students experience virtual reality media

Week 4: Application Scenarios of Educational Technology (1)

Week 5: Application Scenarios of Educational Technology (2)

Week 6: Application of VR and medical practice (1)

Week 7: Application of VR and medical practice (2)

Week 8: Application of medical rehabilitation (1)

Week 9: Application of medical rehabilitation (2)

Week 10: Midterm presentation

Week 11: Application of game industry

Week 12: Marketing advertising application

Week 13: VR film and television creation

Week 14: Guest lecture

Week 15: Future development of virtual reality media

Week 16: Final project presentation
prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program)
